This update includes performance improvements and bug fixes to make Outlook better for you.
Feel free to send us any comments or questions by going to Settings > Help & Feedback – we’d love to hear from you.

package.name: iOS Microsoft OneNote
package.releaseNotes:
This month’s update is bug fixes only.
Thanks for using OneNote! We listened to your feedback and updated the application with optimizations to help improve your note taking experience.
Having trouble? Send feedback in the app (OneNote->Settings->Send Feedback) Have an idea? Add to our feature suggestion box at https://aka.ms/onenotefeedback

package.name: iOS Microsoft OneDrive
package.releaseNotes: This update contains bug fixes and stability improvements.

package.name: iOS Microsoft Windows App Mobile
package.releaseNotes:
In this release we made the following updates:
• Added support for the Windows 365 "Under Review" feature. • Added support for the Windows 365 "Reserve" feature. • Added support for client-side connectivity and system health checks.
• Added an in-app "Authentication Required" notification to signal when the Entra Identity token needs to be renewed. • Added tutorials to guide users through sign-in notifications and account switching.
• Added support for tapping the "Favorite" overlay icon on a device card to unfavorite the device. • Added support for tapping a device card tag to show more information about the device. • Made changes to ensure that device card tags are always visible in thumbnail view to help identify the card type.
• Added the "View Details" action to all device cards. • Reworked the in-session connection information sheet. • Made layout improvements to the devices list view and Connection Center navigation bar.
• Added categories to the Notifications sheet. • Enhanced in-app notification interaction with drag, swipe and trackpad gestures. • Improved the local on-screen keyboard layout and appearance.
• Introduced a disconnect message for cases where the connection is closed due to the remote PC restarting.
• Addressed a number of crashes that were showing up in error reporting. • Addressed reported accessibility bugs. • Fixed an issue where the Space key did not work for some apps in the remote session. • Resolved an issue where location redirection would not work after reconnecting to a remote session.
In addition, we've also made numerous behind-the-scenes updates to improve performance and stability, and to lay the groundwork for upcoming features.
If you encounter any errors, you can contact us via Settings > Submit Feedback.

package.name: iOS Microsoft Defender Security
package.releaseNotes: Bug fixes and improvements

package.name: iOS Microsoft Copilot
package.releaseNotes: Welcome to Microsoft Edge! Here’s what’s new in this release: • Copilot Smart Mode (GPT-5): Copilot in Edge Mobile now adapts to your needs, delivering quick answers or deeper insights with expert results. • Extensions Now Available on iOS: Explore Immersive Translate, Keepa, Coupert, and more for a personalized and productive browsing experience. (Available now on iPhone with iOS 18.4 or later. Extension support for iPad is coming soon.) Upgrade now to experience a smarter, faster, and more productive Microsoft Edge!
